title: Silicone Non-toxic Air Hose — LURPE - Natural Solutions
author: Name
description: El tubo atóxico de silicona se usa para conectar la bomba de aire a las piedras difusoras que se sitúa en el interior del depósito.Es un material que no emite toxicidades al agua.
cleaned_text: Air Hose is used to connect the air pump to the air stones that are located inside the water tank. It is a material that does not emit toxicities to the water. SILICONE
